meanings.definition: A colorless liquid hydrocarbon found in many essential oils.
meanings.sent1: The pinene added a pleasant scent to the essential oil.
meanings.sent2: Essential oils often contain pinene, which gives them their unique fragrance.
meanings.sent3: The pinene in the oil whispered a sweet aroma into the room.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room like pinene, spreading joy everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The pinene danced in the air, leaving a trail of delightful fragrance behind.

meanings.definition: Any of several isomeric hydrocarbons with the formula C10H16, found in many essential oils.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the different types of pinene found in essential oils.
meanings.sent2: Pinene isomers are commonly present in various essential oils.
meanings.sent3: The pinene molecules threw a party in the oil, each one dancing to its own tune.
meanings.sent4: The pinene family in the oil shared a strong bond, sticking together through thick and thin.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the pinene structures looked like tiny interconnected bridges.
